articles.title: ‘Justice For Chutki’ trends after Chhota Bheem episode, makers issue clarification - The Indian Express
articles.description: After the outrage, the makers of the popular show came out with an important clarification. They pointed out that all the  characters in the animated show are children, and none of them were married.
articles.content:
By: Trends Desk | New Delhi | 
Updated: June 5, 2020 1:51:20 pm
Fans rooted for Chhota Bheem and Chutki to be together and were left fuming at makers for the plot twist.Bheem’s decision to be with … [+3685 chars]

articles.title: Aarya trailer: Sushmita Sen returns in powerful story of crime and redemption, watch video - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Aarya trailer has Sushmita Sen as a woman pushed to her limits who will become something she hated to protect her family. Sikander Kher and Chandrachur Singh offer her a strong support in the film.
